title: Morgana is greatly struggling after her mini rework... She could use a compensation buff.
body:
As the title says...

{{champion:25}} is currently sitting at a 48% win rate (support):
http://na.op.gg/champion/morgana/statistics/support
http://champion.gg/champion/Morgana/Support?league=

However, she has a 51%-52% win rate (mid lane):
http://na.op.gg/champion/morgana/statistics/mid
http://champion.gg/champion/Morgana/Middle

W: Tormented Soil

**New Effect** Now restores 8% all ranks of Morgana's maximum mana with every enemy killed by it

R: Soul Shackles

Stun duration increased from 1.5 to 2 seconds all ranks

replies.body: she had almost 60% winrate because of it. they lowered her numbers. also are you bronze or something because morg puts 3 points in w and clears entire minion waves, AND gains 48% max mana? right sounds balanced dude riot should hire you!!

> [{quoted}](name=Xx69 weed 420xX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=67WREsNV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-11T20:49:24.320+0000)
>
> she had almost 60% winrate because of it. they lowered her numbers. also are you bronze or something because morg puts 3 points in w and clears entire minion waves, AND gains 48% max mana? right sounds balanced dude riot should hire you!!

Level 7 Morgana.

She feels like she is struggling in the support role more than the mid lane role. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Colton147,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=67WREsNV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-11T20:52:08.622+0000)
>
> Level 7 Morgana.
> 
> She feels like she is struggling in the support role more than the mid lane role. :)

what he meant is git gud.
why would you remedy a support morgana problem with an EXTREMELY overblown mid lane morg buff

i am a support main.
i am also a level 7 morg.

i love her changes.

% winrate is never a good enough reason to use as the sole basis for a buff or nerf.

Bring actual reasoning, then we can talk.

Until then I remain convinced that Morgana is fine.
Idk, it worked for {{champion:157}}. That and skin sales I guess.
Yasuo is not a good example, his popularity and infamy twist the circumstances. And there were actual balance justifications provided for the changes and not just % winrate.
As I remember it, it was "because winrate" and then they gave him a statball.
Are we both referring to the MR boost that he got this preseason?
It was also a range buff on the ult and some other thing.
That's a little too vague for me to follow along or trust. Can you be a bit more specific?
Range buff on the ult is pretty specific. Check the notes.

Are you insane? You want her to regain 48-54% of her max mana per wave?

You also want to increase the duration of CC that Morg has?
Shes a pretty good jungler now. Clears fast. You basically hit 6, walk into lane with black shield and ult.

I agree she could use buffs, but this is not the correct course of action.

Except her increase on R would be fine since it takes an eternity to proc anyway.
Well considering the whole point was to move her to the midlane like the entire community has been bitching for them to do for years......

I mean I'm silver, so I guess I don't know, but Morg feels pretty damn effective mid AND support - the W changes are arguably even better on support since if you drop W on the ADC and support on the cannon wave you get an almost instant 30% off the CD (assuming they take a full second to get off).

That's a great idea. Lets make it so that Morganna's CC is truly permanent until the enemy is killed, and not just long-lasting so that in all probability you're about to be killed shortly after it lands.

I do like morgana and I was not thrilled about her little rework either. That being said, mana regeneration on kill is not a great idea for her, since it is in support that she is struggling and in that role you shouldn't be last hitting anyway for most of the game.
